Automotive Websites with SEO Boost

If you’re in the automotive repair industry, you know how vital customer service is. Your website is your first impression. Let’s make it a great one. Your website should be user-friendly, responsive, fast, and a place your customers visit for important information. Content is king, so let’s set you up for success. Each website we design and build comes with top SEO-boosting features. See more about SEO plans here. 

Ready

Why choose us?

We have a ton of experience and have had tons of success in the automotive repair industry. Here are a few…

1. Years of experience in automotive repair
2. We understand repair processes, cycle-time and severity
3. We know the claims cycle, PO/RO, estimating
4. Increased brand awareness yearly
5. Increased sales 2x-3x every year

For 15 years we’ve visited every collision repair shop in Houston, San Antonio, and Austin, spending quality time at each one learning about their repair processes.

Before MetricsMule, we co-founded and grew two Houston area companies in the automotive repair industry to massive growth numbers and doubled sales every year for five years straight. In doing so, we’ve learned the exact formula to help you succeed.

The same blueprint that worked for us will work for you.

So when it comes to building your website, marketing consulting, or creating content no one knows more.

Here’s what you can expect: 

  1. Increase your online visibility/Google search/SEO
  2. Grow your brand awareness
  3. Dominate your local market
  4. Create content hubs for you to update your customers
  5. Increase your sales

Check out this post to see more about how MetricsMule got started.

And to top things off, we know the exact formula to increase your onlinve visibility and boost sales.

Increase Your Online Presence

How can I get noticed more?

You have to dominate your local market within a 10-mile radius and make customers WANT to choose you. Here are five automotive marketing tips to help you stand out. 

How can I improve my online visibility?

A user-friendly, fast, reliable website that allows you to post content updates and useful information for your customers. Plus content like videos, informative posts and so much more. 

How can I imporove my SEO?

For a local business, it’s extremely important to have a Google My Business page. It’s even more important to set it up correctly. 

How can I compete against larger shops?

Easy, and we’ll show you how. But one way is to become a local, trusted advisor in your market by providing weekly content in the form of blog posts and videos. 

How can I get on the first page of Google?

  1. A fast, reliable, and updated website. 
  2. Know your keywords
  3. Know your competitor’s keywords

 

How do I show up in search results?

After you understand your important keywords, it’s time to capitalize. 
You can do this in a few ways.
1. Create YouTube videos with those keywords
2. Create blog posts with those keywords 
3. Make sure your website meta data utilizes those keywords

What are the best SEO tools?

There are so many but here are a few of our favorites: 

  1. Semrush
  2. Keywords Everywhere
  3. Keyword Finder 
  4. Rankmath 
  5. vidIQ

Can you help me improve my SEO, how?

Yes! We have 3 awesome packages to choose from.

  1. SEO Boost
  2. SEO Pro
  3. SEO Elite

What’s a good SEO starting point?

Contact us and we’ll help get you started and show you how. But in the meantime, make sure your website is properly set up for Google to crawl it successfully. In addition, consistently provide helpful content for your customers in the form of blog posts and YouTube videos.
